brief_summary.textblock:
To prove that the 3 dimensional sonohysterography is, at least, as effective as the
      diagnostic hysteroscopy in examining the uterine cavity.

clinical_study.brief_title: 3D Ultrasound - Based Hysteroscopy Versus Virtual Hysteroscopy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        - Diagnostic hysteroscopy prescribed either for a case of infertility or in case of doubt
        of endometrial / uterine pathology suspected by ultrasound  or  hysterography.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Current Pregnancy.

          -  Genital infection

intervention.intervention_name: Medison Accuvix V20, sonde 3D5-9EK (Endovaginal 3 dimensional echography)

clinical_study.official_title: Contribution of 3D Sonohysterography and Virtual Hysteroscopy in Exploration of the Uterine Cavity in Comparison to the Diagnostic Hysteroscopy.

oversight_info.authority: France : Agence Française de Sécurité Sanitaire des Produits de Santé

primary_outcome.measure: Polyps, fibrosis, atrophy, hypertrophy and other uterine pathology detected by 3D sonohysterography (Accuracy of uterine cavity exploration by 3D sonohysterography)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
